entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Random black screen in MAUI Blazor. #19588
  • Win: CollectionView HeaderView will show despite there is no record and this will conflict with EmptyView #19628
  • Image/MauiImage does not render a particular SVG #19448
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with Grouping Generates UICollectionView "attempting to apply nil layout attributes to view" on iOS #15862
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] BlazorWebView does not initialize properly on Android platform #19013
  • UseMauiMaps doesn't work if called before ConfigureFonts #16736
    Backlog
  • Changing MainPage of a Maui app breaks OnBackPressedDispatcher callback #19203
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
